item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Night Meetup series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: The Abbey on Admiral Street (near PC)

The Abby is a neighborhood sports bar of the best kind and known for their burgers. It really IS a great spot to watch any sporting event. Its near PC and even if you don't watch sports, its a cozy place to hang out. Don't be jealous Dr. LateNite, but I've got some great 'Gansett coasters I got the last time I was there - don't worry, I'll share ;-). So, let's check it out!

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can't miss us, but just in case, I'll be wearing a silver scarf.
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - The Abby!
